dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notice
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Benjamin Davidson [mailto:benjaminmdavidson@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, July 09, 2006 11:00 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringement Notice
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notice


Copyright Infringement Notice

Sent via email to:
Designated agent of ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207
copyright@theplanet.com

Complaining Party:
Benjamin M. Davidson
2020 Avenue of the Stars
Los Angeles
CA 90067
benjaminmdavidson@gmail.com

Identification of the copyrighted work (hereinafter reffered to as 
"Material"):

(a) http://www.nsinfo.org, the page design
(b) http://www.nsinfo.org, the whole content of the page, including text
and images

of which I am the copyright holder. 

Dear Mr. Poletes,

according to the information provided by RIPE Organisation,
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (hereinafter reffered to as
"ThePlanet.com") is the owner of IP address 70.86.196.194, which
corresponds to www.nsinfo.org.

I claim (Title 17 Section 512 U.S.C.)

(1) that Material is subject of infringing activity and 

(2) request ThePlanet.com to remove or disable access to Material

I have a good faith belief that use of the Material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by me.

Hereby I declare that the information in the notification is accurate, 
and under penalty of perjury, that I am the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.

I appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise me regarding
what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

Benjamin Davidson
